user.title: Login to OIG
user.description: Enter your login/email and password for OIG Cloud

set_box_mode.name: Set Battery Box Mode
set_box_mode.description: Set the operational mode of the battery box.

mode.name: Battery Mode
mode.description: Select the battery mode: Home 1, Home 2, Home 3, or Home UPS.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that calling this service modifies a live system. I take full responsibility for the changes and any effects.

set_grid_delivery.name: Set Grid Delivery Mode
set_grid_delivery.description: Configure export of excess production to the grid. Ensure legal permissions are obtained.

mode.name: Grid Export Mode
mode.description: Choose whether grid export is allowed, limited, or disabled.

limit.name: Grid Export Limit (W)
limit.description: Set the maximum allowed export to the grid in watts.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that enabling this feature modifies a live system. I take full responsibility.

warning.name: Export Warning
warning.description: Before enabling grid export, ensure you have DSO approval. Unauthorized export may lead to penalties.

set_boiler_mode.name: Set Boiler Mode
set_boiler_mode.description: Switch boiler between automatic (CBB) and manual mode.

mode.name: Boiler Mode
mode.description: Select between CBB (automatic) or Manual operation.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge the risks associated with manual boiler mode and accept full responsibility.

set_formating_mode.name: Set Battery Grid Charging
set_formating_mode.description: Enable or disable immediate charging of the battery from the grid.

mode.name: Charging Mode
mode.description: Select to start or stop grid charging of the battery.

limit.name: Target Charge (%)
limit.description: Set the target battery charge percentage.

acknowledgement.name: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.description: I acknowledge that starting battery charging from the grid modifies a live system and accept responsibility.
